meta.name: generator
meta.content: HTML Tidy for Mac OS X (vers 31 October 2006 - Apple Inc. build 15.6), see www.w3.org

table.style: border-width: medium; border-style: none; border-color: -moz-use-text-color; border-collapse: collapse;

td.style: border-right: 1pt solid windowtext; padding: 0cm 5.4pt; border-width: 1pt; border-style: solid; border-color: windowtext; width: 27pt; background-color: transparent;

border-right: 1pt solid windowtext; padding: 0cm 5.4pt; border-width: 1pt 1pt 1pt medium; border-style: solid solid solid none; border-color: windowtext windowtext windowtext #d4d0c8; width: 207pt; background-color: transparent;
